mapper.select: SELECT e.serial_id, e.experiment_id, ee.experiment_name, e.student_id, s.student_name, e.score FROM (experiment_selected_list e INNER JOIN student s ON e.student_id = s.student_id) INNER JOIN experiment ee ON e.experiment_id = ee.experiment_id WHERE e.experiment_id = #{experimentId}

SELECT e.serial_id, e.experiment_id, ee.experiment_name, e.student_id, s.student_name, e.score FROM (experiment_selected_list e INNER JOIN student s ON e.student_id = s.student_id) INNER JOIN experiment ee ON e.experiment_id = ee.experiment_id WHERE e.student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT e.serial_id, e.experiment_id, ee.experiment_name, e.student_id, s.student_name, e.score FROM (experiment_selected_list e INNER JOIN student s ON e.student_id = s.student_id) INNER JOIN experiment ee ON (e.experiment_id = ee.experiment_id AND ee.finished = 1) WHERE e.student_id = #{studentId}
